rules_text:
When Sih, the Fourth Corner enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped.
{4}{U}: Transform Sih, the Fourth Corner. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: [i]It takes a journey to edge of the world...[/i]
rules_text2:
Sih, the World Mother has indestructible as long as you control six or more differently named lands.
You may play land cards from your graveyard.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield from your graveyard, you gain 1 life and draw a card.
flavor_text2: [i]To find the beauty that's hidden in it.[/i]
notes:
Whenever a creature you control attacks, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. If you exiled a land card, you may play that card from exile this turn. If you exiled a creature card, you gain 2 life. If you exiled a noncreature, nonland card, draw a card.

When Sih, the Fourth Corner enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, search your library for a land card and put that card onto the battlefield.
